about_the_game:

(This DLC includes Day3 ~Ending)
*You can't purchase this DLC if you have not purchased Day 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 or x64, architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: SCRAP's famous online Real Escape Game is now available on Steam! "Escape from the Lockdown: The Demon Fortress", which has attracted over 35,000 players, is now playable on Steam! *This bundle include Day3 ~Ending
